swal.pleaseInstall: Please enable or install it in the app store of your browser.
swal.checkLedger: Please check your Ledger wallet is connected to your computer and navigate to the Ethereum app.
swal.checkTrezor: Please check your Trezor wallet is connected to your computer.

help.title: Welcome to {{app}}!
help.intro: You will need a Ethereum account to start exploring. You can get a Ethereum account from a wallet application. There are many wallets, here are the wallets we support:
